chef: Damilola Ariyo is the executive chef at Cookumber. Damilola's passion for food art drove her to get a degree from the International Centre for Culinary Art (ICCA), Dubai after her first degree in Microbiology. Upon completion of her degree from ICCA, she got a job with Jebal Ali a hotel in Dubai where she worked in all the sections of the kitchen. Upon return to Nigeria in 2015 she joined Delinas, a restaurant and confectionary to sharpen her Nigerian content. Damilolaâ€™s love for creativity in food was the birth of Cookumber.
